Posts.Content: kfletch63 wrote: I have a new lump about 2 inches away from an area that had microcalcifications removed 14 years ago. I have had regular mammograms since then with nothing showing up in that area. Dr is sending me for an ultrasound but saying "It feels like a lump of scar tissue". If it hasn't been there for 14 years and just developed over the last 6 months, how could it be related to the prior surgery? Log in to post a reply
